addressLocality[TOK_Q_DELIM]Svizzera[TOK.query: addressLocality: The locality in which the street address is, and which is in the region. For example, Mountain View.

image[TOK_Q_DELIM]https://www.remail.ch/.query: image: An image of the item. This can be a [[URL]] or a fully described [[ImageObject]].

description[TOK_Q_DELIM] Da oltre 50 ann.query: description: A description of the item.

openingHours[TOK_Q_DELIM]Lunedì – Venerd.query: openingHours: The general opening hours for a business. Opening hours can be specified as a weekly time range, starting with days, then times per day. Multiple days can be listed with commas ',' separating each day. Day or time ranges are specified using a hyphen '-'. * Days are specified using the following two-letter combinations: ```Mo```, ```Tu```, ```We```, ```Th```, ```Fr```, ```Sa```, ```Su```. * Times are specified using 24:00 format. For example, 3pm is specified as ```15:00```, 10am as ```10:00```. * Here is an example: <time itemprop="openingHours" datetime="Tu,Th 16:00-20:00">Tuesdays and Thursdays 4-8pm</time>. * If a business is open 7 days a week, then it can be specified as <time itemprop="openingHours" datetime="Mo-Su">Monday through Sunday, all day</time>.

publicAccess[TOK_Q_DELIM]True[TOK_Q_DELI.query: publicAccess: A flag to signal that the [[Place]] is open to public visitors.  If this property is omitted there is no assumed default boolean value.
